string.name: migration_link
string.comment: the value is a link to a help page.

string.name: migration_email
string.comment: the value is our email address

resources.string: Please contact us at %1$s to get help.
AnkiDroid cannot access your images, video and sounds anymore.
AnkiDroid cannot access your collection anymore.

string.name: migration_warning_uninstall_sync_possible
string.comment: general warning for a normal usage

resources.string: If you uninstall the app without synchronizing first, you risk losing all data (all notes, reviews, media).

string.name: migration_warning_uninstall_sync_impossible
string.comment: warning for failed migration, when sync is impossible.

resources.string: If you uninstall the app you risk losing all data (all notes, reviews, media).
An update may slow down AnkiDroid during a few minutes.
You can not sync your data during AnkiDroid update. Please retry in a few minutes.
